name: Boomerang Ducky
description: Instructions: Move with WASD turn with arrow keys space to shoot your boomerang. The computer is being attacked by the three types of robots and you must protect it by attacking them with your boomerang. The tall one only attacks you. The small one only attacks the computer and is peaceful to you. And the medium sized one will attack whatever is closest. If you get hit by a robot you die and will respawn in a few seconds. Collect chips and bring them to the computer to gain powerups. The coin gives you score. The boots make you run faster. And the heart heals the computer. Keep the computer alive and get the highest score possible have fun.
